title: How to Bowl a 91 Pin Strike in Wii Sports

steps.title: On the main menu, select Training (the blue weights, next to the Wii Fitness button).
steps.content: On the main menu, select Training (the blue weights, next to the Wii Fitness button).

steps.title: Under bowling, choose Power Throws (the second one down).
steps.content: Under bowling, choose Power Throws (the second one down).

steps.title: At the beginning of the tenth stage, press the A button.
steps.content: At the beginning of the tenth stage, press the A button. Instead of moving your Mii left or right, you can adjust the angle of the throw.

steps.title: Adjust your angle two clicks to the right.
steps.content: Adjust your angle two clicks to the right.

steps.title: Press the A button and move as far right as you can against the barrier.
steps.content: Press the A button and move as far right as you can against the barrier.

steps.title: Throw the ball up (or loft it), trying not to have any spin on the ball.
steps.content: Throw the ball up (or loft it), trying not to have any spin on the ball.

steps.title: If done correctly, the ball should travel down the barrier.
steps.content: If done correctly, the ball should travel down the barrier. When it reaches the end, a "sonic boom" will be heard, and every pin will soon fall over.

steps.title: If you are left handed, you must do it on the left side.
steps.content: If you are left handed, you must do it on the left side. If you try to do it on the opposite side, this will not work.
